laazotea.indi.client

Interface INDIDeviceListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleINDIClient

    public interface INDIDeviceListener
    A interface to be notified about changes in a INDIProperty
    Version:
    1.10, March 19, 2012
    Author:
    S. Alonso (Zerjillo) [zerjioi at ugr.es]

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void messageChanged(INDIDevice device)
      Called when the message for a Device has changed.
      void newProperty(INDIDevice device, INDIProperty property)
      Called when a new Property is added to the Device.
      void removeProperty(INDIDevice device, INDIProperty property)
      Called when a Property is removed from a Device.

    • Method Detail

      • newProperty

        void newProperty(INDIDevice device,
               INDIProperty property)
        Called when a new Property is added to the Device.
        Parameters:
        device - The Device on which the Property has been addded.
        property - The Property that has been added.

      • removeProperty

        void removeProperty(INDIDevice device,
                  INDIProperty property)
        Called when a Property is removed from a Device.
        Parameters:
        device - The Device to which the Property has been removed.
        property - The Property that has been removed.

      • messageChanged

        void messageChanged(INDIDevice device)
        Called when the message for a Device has changed.
        Parameters:
        device - The device to which the message has changed.
